testcase.name: user register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender.....................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "mohamed@example.com" field............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "mohamed@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could change currency to euro
testcase.name: user could switch currency to euro
testcase.system-out: When user select euro currency..............................................passed Then user can find euro symbol shown on the products in Home page...........passed
